amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being made availabe to Cornell University for Grape Genetics research, Geneva, NY.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 110-290 to prohibit use of funds for grape genetics research in Geneva, NY.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 353 (Roll no. 810).
